statements: DELETE FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions WHERE research_focus = 'Cancer Research';
DELETE FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions WHERE location = 'New York' AND research_focus LIKE '%cancer%';
DELETE FROM stemcell_research_institutions WHERE institution_name = 'Biotech Research Center';
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM findings WHERE project_id = 2 AND researcher_id = 4;
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
